summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4278 for the improvement of 6th Avenue South, from Massachusetts Street to Holgate Street; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50873, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
